venue.name: Case Mountain in Manchester (Birch Mountain Road)

item.description:
A hike so nice we have to do it twice. Our next hike is this Sunday August 23 at 10:00 AM - back in Manchester at Case Mountain, at the Birch Mountain Road parking lot. Note that it's on Sunday, and the time is 10 am.

Sandy Lok will once again lead the charge!

Duration
Variable based on what the group decides. Typically it's approx 2 hours total.

Directions
We will be meeting up at the Case Pond parking lot on Birch Mountain road. Note: there are two parking lots on Birch Mountain road - we are meeting at the Case Pond Trailhead, NOT the Shenipsit Trailhead. I will be in a small blue Hyundai Elantra Touring.

Case Pond parking lot - Traveling Eastbound
I-384 east, exit 4, take left onto Spring Street, right at traffic light onto Highland Street, turns into Camp Meeting Road, first right onto Birch Mountain Road, take immediate right into parking lot.

Case Pond parking lot - Traveling Westbound
I-384 west, exit 4, take right onto Highland Street, stay straight through traffic light, turns into Camp Meeting Road, first right onto Birch Mountain Road, take immediate right into parking lot.

Google Maps link
http://maps.google.co...

More info
http://recreation.tow...

Contact
Please contact me if you're running late or need directions en-route
via voice / SMS at 860-227-4027, or
via email at fredlunau@fastmail.fm, or
via Twitter at http://twitter.com/fr...

Quick weather forecast link (forecast so far: decent)
http://www.wundergrou...

See you there!
item.name: Case Mountain in Manchester (Birch Mountain Road)
